item.description:
It's the final race in this well-loved series and we're planning a great day for you. We'll have a band to provide the soundtrack, Great Food including Ice Cream and Pizza and, of course, plenty of craft beer from the Smuttynose Brewing Company.

***This race WILL sell out***

No race day registration will be available.  If you are interested, please register soon at:
http://www.locorunning.com/smuttynose-index.html

This link has additional race details.

We will meet in Braintree to carpool up.  Location: TBA

Registration: $25 until May 1st, Late registration $30.

Race starts at 11am, but we will meet in Braintree at 8am to carpool up and pick up numbers.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in Braintree at 8am.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Smuttynose Will Run for Beer 5K
